long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily view EXIF or PNG metadata of most images.

Simply right click an image and click "View Image Metadata" to see a popup of all available image data. (Make sure to refresh your open tabs after installing)

For Stable Diffusion users, there is a specialized layout that intelligently organizes prompt and model parameter data in a readable and copyable way. Works with Automatic1111 and related UIs (does not support ComfyUI nodes yet). Makes tuning parameters for your images much more convenient!

Update: Added button to copy raw sd parameter string.

No ads or other monetization. I was sick of seeing all the broken or ad-ridden extensions claiming to show metadata which should be simple so I made this extension.

More features to be added. If you have ideas for features or bugs, feel free to send me an email.

Note: Does not currently support Adobe XMP tags. Support will be added.
